songs.title: Mentiras
songs.lyrics:
L [Chorus]
Those are all lies
That night I walked there
You must be confused
Or had a guy just like me

[Verse 1]
They tell you they saw me walking in the city
With fine clothes and looking hunk
Looking at all the girls passing by my
But that's impossible I was never there
When you're not with me I'm good
I'm trapped watching TV
I do not go even to the corner and talk to my neighbor
Although I do not deny you're still divine

[Chorus]

[Verse 1]
You say you saw me on a web page
With two Evas next door and a beer too
That was very pleased and as distracted
I swear this time I was more than sleep
Not that I do not talk to me that is passed
Your always there and I rest in my house
Reading me a few books pa 'to understand
As I understand you treat and woman

[Chorus]

[Break]
Lie, lie, lie, lie [x2]

[Chorus x2]
